review: Purchased this so that I could watch Amazon Prime TV, HBO Go, and Netflix in my bedroom.  Setup was a snap (it already had my Amazon account info loaded).  Picture quality is fantastic.  My wife has even used it to play solitaire and other small games.  It's faster and easier to use than my Xbox or Wii for simple media viewing, and has quickly become my preferred option.
